cleaned_text: An Herbal Medicine & Acupuncture Clinic in Saint Petersburg Acupuncture & Herbal Therapies was founded with the intention of healing and teaching. To spread awareness about herbal and Traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) and the treatment of acupuncture; a simple yet effective remedy for pain and most other ailments. We are located in the sunny city of Saint Petersburg within the Grand Central District and accept patients whether local or just visiting. You will find alongside the clinic a fully stocked apothecary with both Western & Chinese herbs which is open to the public six days a week. Our outstanding staff of herbal and acupuncture practitioners is here to help you meet your holistic health goals. Anyone looking to further their knowledge of herbalism can find several classes and events to attend with our school, Traditions School of Herbal Studies.
